Traits.Name: Body of the Land
Traits.Description: When defeated, roll a d6. The Hob collapses into the natural land, disappearing. Every space of this Hob becomes a height 1 terrain piece (5-6), difficult terrain (2-4), or a pit (1).

Actions.Name: Summon Root
Actions.Description: The Bark spirit creates a root, a sturdy size 1 summon in range 5. The area around the root is difficult terrain, and the root emits aura 1 around it. Foes in the aura are winded.

Actions.Name: Curse of Thorns
Actions.Description: A character in range 5 from the Bark Spirit is cursed and marked. While marked, if that character ends their turn within range 2 of a hob or a hob summon, they take [D] piercing damage.
